articles.title: Trump Threatens 250% Tariffs On Pharmaceutical Imports
articles.description: President Trump has threatened to impose tariffs of up to 250% on pharmaceutical imports, aiming to encourage domestic production of pharmaceuticals.

articles.title: CDC To Disburse Delayed Funds Including For Overdose Prevention, Staffers Say
articles.description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is set to fully fund the Overdose Data to Action program ahead of a key budget deadline, according to CDC staffers.

articles.title: Perseverance Rover Captures Mars Vista As Clear As Day
articles.description: NASA's Perseverance rover has captured one of the sharpest panoramas of Mars, showcasing a remarkably clear Martian sky.
